data.name: ViewSettings
desc: provides access to the settings of the controller of a text document.
**since**
LibreOffice 5.1

properties.name: HideWhitespace
desc: If this property is TRUE, whitespaces around pages are hidden.
**since**
LibreOffice 5.1

properties.name: HorizontalRulerMetric
desc: metric unit of the horizontal ruler
Uses values com.sun.star.awt.FieldUnit
**since**
OOo 3.1

properties.name: IsExecuteHyperlinks
desc: If this property is TRUE hyperlinks in the document are executed (loaded) on mouse click.
Otherwise they are handled like normal text.

properties.name: IsRasterVisible
desc: Specifies whether to display the grid or not.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: IsSnapToRaster
desc: Specifies whether to move frames, drawing elements, and form functions only between grid points.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: IsVertRulerRightAligned
desc: If this property is TRUE, the vertical ruler is aligned to the right side of the view and the vertical scrollbar is on the left.

properties.name: RasterResolutionX
desc: Defines the unit of measure for the spacing between grid points on the X-axis.
The value must be greater than 0. The application may enforce more restricting bounds for the value.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: RasterResolutionY
desc: Defines the unit of measure for the spacing between grid points on the Y-axis.
The value must be greater than 0. The application may enforce more restricting bounds for the value.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: RasterSubdivisionX
desc: Specifies the number of intervals between grid points on the X-axis.
The value must be greater or equal to 0, and the application may enforce an upper bound for the value.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: RasterSubdivisionY
desc: Specifies the number of intervals between grid points on the Y-axis.
The value must be greater or equal to 0, and the application may enforce an upper bound for the value.
**since**
OOo 2.0

properties.name: ShowAnnotations
desc: If this property is TRUE, annotations (notes) are visible.

properties.name: ShowBookmarks
desc: If this property is TRUE, bookmark positions are displayed.
**since**
LibreOffice 7.0

properties.name: ShowBreaks
desc: If this property is TRUE, paragraph line breaks are visible.

properties.name: ShowChangesInMargin
desc: If this property is TRUE, tracked deletions are shown in margin.
**since**
LibreOffice 7.1

properties.name: ShowContentTips
desc: If this property is TRUE, tips for document content are shown, typically in a help balloon when the mouse is over the content.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.1

properties.name: ShowDrawings
desc: If this property is TRUE, shapes are visible.

properties.name: ShowFieldCommands
desc: If this property is TRUE, text fields are shown with their commands; otherwise the content is visible.

properties.name: ShowFootnoteBackground
desc: If this property is TRUE, footnotes symbols are displayed with gray background.

properties.name: ShowGraphics
desc: If this property is TRUE, graphic objects are visible.

properties.name: ShowHiddenCharacters
desc: If this property is TRUE, hidden characters are displayed.
**since**
OOo 3.0

properties.name: ShowHiddenParagraphs
desc: If this property is TRUE, hidden paragraphs are displayed.

properties.name: ShowHiddenText
desc: If this property is TRUE, hidden text is displayed.

properties.name: ShowHoriRuler
desc: If this property is TRUE and the property ShowRulers is TRUE, the horizontal ruler is displayed.

properties.name: ShowHoriScrollBar
desc: If this property is TRUE and the property ShowRulers is TRUE, the horizontal scroll bar is displayed.

properties.name: ShowIndexMarkBackground
desc: If this property is TRUE, index marks are displayed with gray background.

properties.name: ShowInlineTooltips
desc: If this property is TRUE, tooltips for tracked changes are shown.
**since**
LibreOffice 6.1

properties.name: ShowNonprintingCharacters
desc: If this property is TRUE, the settings of non-printing characters are applied.
This option controls the use of the settings ShowHiddenCharacters, ShowTabstops, ShowSpaces, ShowBreaks and ShowParaBreaks
**since**
OOo 3.0

properties.name: ShowOnlineLayout
desc: If this property is TRUE the document will be displayed as if it were a HTML document.

properties.name: ShowOutlineContentVisibilityButton
desc: If this property is TRUE, the outline content visibility toggle button is shown.
**since**
LibreOffice 7.1

properties.name: ShowParaBreaks
desc: If this property is TRUE, paragraph breaks are visible.

properties.name: ShowProtectedSpaces
desc: If this property is TRUE, protected spaces (hard spaces) are displayed with gray background.

properties.name: ShowRulers
desc: ShowHoriRuler and ShowVertRuler determine whether a ruler is visible.

properties.name: ShowScrollBarTips
desc: If this property is TRUE, and the scroll bar is shown, a tool tip is displayed while scrolling.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.2

properties.name: ShowSoftHyphens
desc: If this property is TRUE, soft hyphens are displayed with gray background.

properties.name: ShowSpaces
desc: If this property is TRUE, spaces are displayed with dots.

properties.name: ShowTableBoundaries
desc: If this property is TRUE, table boundaries are displayed.

properties.name: ShowTables
desc: If this property is TRUE, tables are visible.

properties.name: ShowTabstops
desc: If this property is TRUE, tab stops are visible.

properties.name: ShowTextBoundaries
desc: If this property is TRUE, text boundaries are displayed.

properties.name: ShowTextFieldBackground
desc: If this property is TRUE, text fields are displayed with gray background.

properties.name: ShowVertRuler
desc: If this property is TRUE, the vertical ruler is displayed.

properties.name: ShowVertScrollBar
desc: If this property is TRUE, the vertical scroll bar is displayed.

properties.name: SmoothScrolling
desc: If this property is TRUE, smooth scrolling is active.

properties.name: TreatSubOutlineLevelsAsContent
desc: If this property is TRUE, sub outline levels are treated as content in outline content visibility actions.
**since**
LibreOffice 7.2

properties.name: UseHeaderFooterMenu
desc: If this property is TRUE, the advanced menu for header/footer is shown.
**since**
LibreOffice 6.2

properties.name: VerticalRulerMetric
desc: metric unit of the vertical ruler
Uses values from com.sun.star.awt.FieldUnit
**since**
OOo 3.1

properties.name: ZoomType
desc: This property defines the zoom type for the document.

properties.name: ZoomValue
desc: Defines the zoom value to use.
Valid only if the ZoomType is set to com.sun.star.view.DocumentZoomType.BY_VALUE.
